fields.name: ClusterBootstrapAccount
fields.description: Account name used for creating cluster (at minimum needs permissions to 'Create Computer Objects' in domain).

fields.name: ClusterOperatorAccount
fields.description: Account name used for operating cluster i.e. will be part of administrators group on all the participating virtual machines in the cluster.

fields.name: DomainFqdn
fields.description: Fully qualified name of the domain.

fields.name: OuPath
fields.description: Organizational Unit path in which the nodes and cluster will be present.

fields.name: SqlServiceAccount
fields.description: Account name under which SQL service will run on all participating SQL virtual machines in the cluster.

fields.name: StorageAccountPrimaryKey
fields.description: Primary key of the witness storage account.

fields.name: StorageAccountUrl
fields.description: Fully qualified ARM resource id of the witness storage account.
